page.title: 04OUR SCHOOL WESTON ON TRENT
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS SMALL AND AT PRESENT HAS ONLY 18 CHILDREN AGED FOUR TO ELEVEN.THE BUILDING IS OLD WITH HIGH CEILINGS AND IS NOT VERY COMFORTABLE.IT ONLY HAS TWO CLASSROOMS,ONE SMALL OFFICE AND TOILETS.WE USE THE VILLAGE HALL FOR P.E. AND WE EAT OUR LUNCH THERE, BUT IN WINTER IT IS NOT VERY CONVENIENT TO HAVE TO WALK THERE. OUR GAMES FIELD IS EVEN FURTHER AWAY. WE DON'T HAVE MANY SCHOOL RULES BECAUSE IT IS ONLY A LITTLE SCHOOL AND WE ARE ALL VERY GOOD!WE ALL PREFER OUR SMALL SCHOOL EVEN THOUGH WE DON'T HAVE A SMART BUILDING AND LOTS OF EQUIPMENT,BECAUSE IT IS FRIENDLY AND WE ALL FEEL LIKE ONE BIG FAMILY.LIFE FOR THE SCHOOL WAS MUCH BETTER WHEN WE HAD THE VILLAGE HALL WHICH IS NOW A FACTORY. WE MISS THE SPACE AND THE EXTRA FACILITIES.
